channel.title: CVE Feed for Holded -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Holded -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4026|2024-04-22T11:51:25.205Z -- holded -- holded
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Holded application. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to store a JavaScript payload within all editable parameters within the 'General' and 'Team ID' functionalities, which could result in a session takeover.
